content.rendered:
Who we are

We are a dynamic team of skilled developers, designers, and support experts, dedicated to creating high-quality products

Combining top class coding, fresh intuitive design, and unmatched functionality, we build outstanding WordPress themes. Our goal is to create simple, elegant web solutions that help our clients accomplish their goals without effort. For this, we explore cutting-edge technologies and infuse them into beautifully handcrafted themes.

What we offer

Intuitive Design

Fine Coding

Top Functionality

Meet our dedicated

tagDiv Team

Radu O.

Programmer

Passionate about coding, I enjoy designing complex systems that are easy to use. I'm the one who makes sure the code is clean, the development is on the right track, the team efficiency is high, and the customers are happy.

Emil G.

Programmer

Hiking, running and strategy games, I like them all. Spending most of the time playing with scripts and codes, I develop and test new features. Between tasks, I’m delighted to go back to my first love - support - and give a helping hand to our clients.

Lucian C.

Programmer

I’m fascinated by social and modern user interaction. Curious and eager to improve, I enjoy learning new things. The development center is the perfect place to design users experience and improve the way they interact with their website.

George O.

Programmer

Passionate about dancing and nature, I love nights out with friends and camping trips. At work, I am always seeking new ways to fine tune my skills so I always find myself researching new ways to create better results with best efficiency.

Ioan C.

Designer

I'm the youngest member of the tagDiv team. Enthusiastic about photography, illustrations, painting, WordPress and web design, I love to create unique layouts and features that our customers can enjoy!

Alina S.

Digital Marketing

Originally trained as a journalist, I enjoy testing new technologies, discovering new ways to make things easier, and, especially, telling everybody about my discoveries. At tagDiv, my work focuses on designing great experiences for our visitors.

Bogdan B.

Support

Passionate about gaming, I love to give you a helping hand. I have worked with customers in the past, and I face every request like a new challenge to bring my skills to the next level.

Simion C.

Support

In love with nature, I always enjoy a good bike ride or a camping adventure. I like listening to good music and face challenges, so the support center sometimes feels like a playground.

Calin N.

Support

I enjoy talking to people since I’m an extrovert by nature. Mobile games are my way of passing the time. Through travelling, I explore new parts of the world and discover myself.

Marius P.

Designer

My inspiration comes from modern architecture and experimental design. I love creating unique templates and graphic layouts, to provide our community an amazing visual experience and an intuitive user interface.

Nicu G.

Programmer

I’m an alpine skiing and coding enthusiast. My passion for code started back in college, and over the years I've worked on many projects. Now, I use my experience to engineer new cool features, to add muscle under the hood of our products.

Cristian P.

Designer

I started out a few years ago drawing vector illustrations. Now, I’m exploring new fields looking for original and modern design solutions. I also check the trends making sure we deliver the latest user interface technology in our products.

Alexandra I.

Designer

As an artist and designer, I aim to create something brilliant daily. Eager to learn more, I use my free time to get better at what interests me, whether it's photography, painting, or even something entirely new. I also play video games 🙂

Bettina F.

Support

Passionate for travelling, I love helping people discover efficient solutions to their problems. I strongly believe that listening to our customers is the best way to improve our products so I do it everyday.

Alina G.

Digital Marketing

After a long journey through fine arts, I finally found the place that challenges me every day. With a strategic approach, I’m creating valuable and relevant content about our products and the news industry. My innate conversational skills are my strongest point.

Eliza M.

QA/Support

I am a music, nature and books lover whose path is not yet perfectly defined. Combining my empathic nature with the enthusiasm for knowledge, I’m trying to put my skills to good use.

Alin V.

Support

I love speed and technology, and I constantly follow the news on cars, motorcycles and IT. With my support colleagues, I’m always ready to help our customers adjust their websites to specific needs!

Anamaria S.

Support

I love helping people and finding solutions for unpredictable problems. Being a member of the tagDiv team has allowed me to always evolve and I am happy with what I accomplish.

What our customers say

I am in love with this team and of course with Newspaper and I am sure that we are gonna live together forever.

Nitesh Manav

CEO, Tomatoheart Media

Newspaper is a versatile theme, that comes with its own page builder that gives you infinite possibilities to build/customize any element, page, or a post layout.

Amit Malewar

Founder at Tech Explorist

Newspaper is a complete out-of-the-box WordPress theme, and also gives you the ability to fine-tune your website if you need it.

Maikel van Wijk

Owner at Hip&Hot
